cancel.name: Close/Cancel
cancel.desc: Close or cancel the current dialog box/popup.

screenshot.watermark.name: Toggle watermark
screenshot.watermark.desc: Toggle product/company watermark for official screenshots.

cut.name: Cut to clipboard
cut.desc: Cut selected text and copy to the clipboard.

exit.name: Custom exit to desktop
exit.desc: Custom hotkey to trigger exit-to-desktop. The native hotkeys (Alt+F4 / Cmd+Q / etc.) are always active.

profile.save.name: Save profile
profile.save.desc: Save current profiler data to logs/profile.txt.

profile2.toggle.name: Toggle profiler2
profile2.toggle.desc: Toggle HTTP/GPU modes for new profiler.

text.delete.left.name: Delete before cursor
text.delete.left.desc: Delete word to the left of cursor.

text.delete.right.name: Delete after cursor
text.delete.right.desc: Delete word to the right of cursor.

text.move.left.name: Move cursor to left word
text.move.left.desc: Move cursor to start of word to the left of cursor.

text.move.right.name: Move cursor to right word
text.move.right.desc: Move cursor to start of word to the right of cursor.
